catalog_info.title: Arab-Israeli Conflict
catalog_info.description: In this course, we will examine the several dimensions and levels (domestic, international) of the ongoing crisis in, around, and about Israel/Palestine.  In what ways is the Arab-Israeli conflict central to broader political patterns in the region, and why has it proven so intractable?  How have the various parties to the conflict defined its stakes, understood their interests, viewed their adversaries, mobilized support, and formulated policy?  What possibilities does the future hold?
